title: Remove gates
body:
We don't want hour and 20 minute games please. Defenders already have enough of an advantage without being able to pace back and forth gates. I know riot won't remove them because riot hates to admit they are wrong. So nerf them, put a 30second cd on how often you can pace back and forth.

Riot trying to have an edge over dota with poor updates isn't working. The first thing I thought about was "Guess it's time to quit and play dota" when gates came out.
inb4 so quite and gtfo then

Well, I suppose I shouldn't be surprised a Bronze 3 player is whining on a thread about the game rather than mentioning ANYTHING about the thread's creation. Nice job.

On topic. The gates aren't a bad thing, they're actually quite nice and I haven't experienced any issues where the defenders have an ungodly amount of defense because of it. It allows them to properly defend their base against an onslaught as well as catch people who are off near that gate tossing spells to poke people down from odd angles.

Well, considering you've only played in S4, that means your rank MMR was non-existent. This means in your 10 ranked games, you had Silver 1 to Gold 1 players to start with. To end up in Bronze, you have to lose a minimum of about five games. My rank was silver at the end of S3 and half way through S4, I was plat 1. RL kept me away for about three months though, so I dropped to 5. I'm now back in Plat 4. I've also been in Bronze. At the start of S3, I was Bronze because of the League system kinda screwing up everything. ELO after 10/10 wins was about 1200-1300, depending on what ELO your enemies were, which was considered Bronze still, so... League system introduction didn't make us re-do the first 10. They shoved us into ranks based on ELO. Despite this, I went from Bronze 4 to Silver 1 by the end of S3 and into Plat 1 in S4. If I can do it, anyone can 'cause I know I'm not a pro. You play your best and stay quiet. Mute your teammates if you have to. Trust me. Been there, done that.
